concept.title: Device Information Tutorial
concept.shortdesc: This tutorial describes how to get the device information using the telephony API for applications.

conbody.p: The telephony API for application is a sub set of the multimode API. The telephony API for applications can be used by any client applications to access the basic telephony functions. The multimode API provides the rich set of telephony functions but it is available only to the handset manufacturers.
